The story takes place in a world where the men are completely in charge. The people classified as âmenâ are huge, strong, dominant, intelligent, and sexist. The females are small, weak, submissive, and stupid. Even the weakest men are A LOT stronger than the strongest females. Also, there are a lot more men than women.

You usually sleep on one of your family member's bed with him. The men in this world often sexually interact with each other, while sexually dominating the women.
